title: Jocuserious
author: Jocuserious
content: Scam, death both have in altcoins market so why you want investing altcoins?My opinion buy dip and sold faster on some profits like to be best revenge for all altcoins investors! What's your skills and opinion?

comments.author: martinex
comments.body: I don't really like altcoins, especially new coins, meme classes, or hype coins. However, many argue for Altcoins, especially the newer projects, that they can experience rapid price growth, providing the potential opportunity for significant investment ROI and I'm also surprised it has always been able to attract so much interest from both investors and developers.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 04, 2023, 09:08:03 AMScam, death both have in altcoins market so why you want investing altcoins?My opinion buy dip and sold faster on some profits like to be best revenge for all altcoins investors! What's your skills and opinion?  Most altcoins are best for short term and a few might be considered good for long term. But that's where the debate starts because everyone has their own taste of altcoins.Many are the ones that looks at it as their ticket to lottery and likely to give them the best profits that they can think of for a very short period of time. But little did they know, that's gonna butcher them when the altcoin they've chosen is mostly a pump and dump.

comments.author: konflikkastil
comments.body: Altcoins are so important, they are the only things keeping that keeps the crypto space market going. Imagine if it was to be only Bitcoin? How many people would be able to afford owning a single unit of Bitcoin. Altcoins came into play and the market was open for new projects and thousands of Altcoins was introduced. Lot of people have made more money from Altcoins than Bitcoin, it has given Bitcoin the run of its life. The best thing that happened to the crypto market space is the introduction of Altcoins every single day.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: I'm not an altcoin holder, and I don't like them much personally.However, I do recognize their quality in attracting new investors to the market, and for some of them, in trying to solve real-life problems. But the question is, have altcoins done more good than harm to the crypto ecosystem? For every thousand investors and new crypto enthusiasts that altcoins have brought in, how many have they disgusted with scams, rug pulls and other shenanigans?They're important, because they represent a huge financial volume. But for me, their greatest quality is to demonstrate day after day how solid, useful and self-sufficient Bitcoin is. I can't even count the number of messages I've read on the internet saying: "I got into cryptos for a get-rich-quick scheme with some altcoins, after failures and disappointments I'm now all-in BTC". Many don't understand how altcoins work. Those who make money, make altcoins useful because they earn profit with them, those who lose money, make them useful because sometimes it directs them to BTC.It's nuanced, as always, ETH is not a stupid memecoin, and don't offer the same possibilities. So I think some alts can be important, while others are just losses for everyone (except for their dubious developers who get rich on the backs of investors, examples are numerous on the BSC chain).

comments.author: topbitcoin
comments.body: When viewed from the project of its developers Altcoin in fact has the benefits to expand marketing and job vacancies in its development for many people, and again has a more reliable crypto technology option in the use of blockchain networks, but it is also a Bitcoin comparison that makes Bitcoin king Coins, so if there is no altcoin, there might not be a crypto market as big as now and make Bitcoin the king of all coins. That may be some of the benefits of altcoin and competition in the network.With an alternative coin language, which is an option where you can benefit from other coin investments besides Bitcoin, or we can call diversification.For a lot of altcoin who died or scam, I think it is a fact that cannot be changed, but to avoid coins like that depending on how you analyze the project, with the meaning that you cannot punish altcoin as a scam, because we see in the market many altcoin which provides benefits to the investor, but if it is intended for the long term you must really think about it again

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 04, 2023, 09:08:03 AMScam, death both have in altcoins market so why you want investing altcoins?Profit.I guess most of the investors out there (including me) are investing into altcoins for the sake of profit, and nothing more. Maybe there are some who wants to show their support towards the project thru holding their coin, but most are because of profit. Scam, and death are more likely to happen in new projects, but for the projects that are out there for years already, the chances of it to be either scam or dead project is way lesser than that of new projects.Quote from: Jocuserious on July 04, 2023, 09:08:03 AMMy opinion buy dip and sold faster on some profits like to be best revenge for all altcoins investors! What's your skills and opinion?  That's very easy to say, but the question is can you do it in real time?It's easy to say "buy the dip", or "sell on top" etc. but the reality is you don't know when it will happen, and by the time it happens, you might lost your patience already and bought at a wrong time. As for me, I don't have any skills at all. I just invest, and hold it for long term. I don't know TBH if I have skills that would've help me in investing. As for my opinion, there are some altcoins out there who are important still. Bitcoin isn't a one size fits all type of cryptocurrency where it all has the good features already, and that's where altcoins shine. There are some altcoins out there who are covering what Bitcoin can't do. For ex. transaction speed. Bitcoin's transaction speed is slow that's why we are seeing altcoins that has a faster transaction speed as an alternative coin to be used when transacting.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: The human nature to take risks. That is the only reason why lotteries, HYIPs, Chit-funds and altcoins exist in the first place, similar things have been in circulation since a long time. Those who invest are trading the risk for the reward and hence the craze and thus the scams.But I consider the top altcoins to be of some use specially when the bitcoin networks becomes too congested and difficult to push a transaction through without paying hefty fees.Beyond that I am enthusiastic more about bitcoin than altcoins. But if I do invest, it will be among the top five.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Some altcoins have their importance on crypto market, as they brought alternative blockchains with different features which proportionate developers to launch their own projects, such as the popular Ethereum chain. We can think it's all useless, but let's keep in mind such altcoins allowed many professionals to acquire more experience and practice their programming skills.Meanwhile, other altcoins are important tokens inside determined platforms. They are what we call native tokens, which guarantee additional benefits for holders inside an exchange, casino or investment platform. Altcoins are also assets with rewarding potential. So, they shouldn't be neglected. We just have to be careful selecting the worthful ones and despising the worthless scammy ones.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on July 04, 2023, 09:08:03 AMScam, death both have in altcoins market so why you want investing altcoins?My opinion buy dip and sold faster on some profits like to be best revenge for all altcoins investors! What's your skills and opinion?  ETH is an altcoin. I hope you know that? So, do you still have that generalization of how shitty altcoins are? Well, imagine all the tokens and even coins that were (and are still) birthed through the ETH contract which has deepened this cryptocurrency industry. Without ETH, this industry wouldn't have gone this competitive. Yes, I know many will argue that the preponderance of altcoins paved way for the many cases of scam in the industry. That's not entirely true. Left with only Bitcoin, I'm cocksure scam in the industry will still exist.Again, I can bet you that many of those who bad mouth altcoins still have them in their wallets. Altcoins aren't that bad to invest in. It's just that investors should be meticulous while picking ones to invest in. On the short run, altcoins give better ROI than Bitcoin and I guess that's why they keep attracting investments.

Therefore, the disadvantages of altcoins makes bitcoin more recognised and value. Apart from how it increases the personal standing of bitcoin, it create investment opportunities for investors which means you can trade or hodl altcoins however short or long-term depending on your profit viability. It is seen as an asset whose value is expected to increase in the future.
